params.name: -o, --org ORG
params.desc: the org to list the apps for

params.name: -A, --all
params.desc: list all collaborated apps, including joined org apps in personal app list

params.name: -p, --personal
params.desc: list apps in personal account when a default org is set

subcommands.name: apps:fork
subcommands.desc: fork an existing app into a new one

subcommands.name: apps:join --app APP
subcommands.desc: add yourself to an organization app

subcommands.name: apps:leave --app APP
subcommands.desc: remove yourself from an organization app

subcommands.name: apps:lock --app APP
subcommands.desc: lock an organization app to restrict access

subcommands.name: apps:open --app APP
subcommands.desc: open the app in a web browser

subcommands.name: apps:stacks
subcommands.desc: show the list of available stacks

subcommands.name: apps:stacks:set STACK
subcommands.desc: set the stack of an app

subcommands.name: apps:transfer RECIPIENT
subcommands.desc: transfer applications to another user, organization or team

subcommands.name: apps:unlock --app APP
subcommands.desc: unlock an organization app so that any org member can join it
